PathOfBuilding.Notes:
The Bearded Shaman is used as a basis due to the similiarities to the (Perfect) Spirit of Fortune. Differences depend on the level of the spectres and are accounted for by custom modifiers. The Current setup only works with Spark not the Nova.
Power charges come from Assassin's Mark which is only used in the bossing setup, for a better approximation in the mapping setup the charges have to turned be off in the configuration setup.

Items.Item: Rarity: UNIQUE Kingmaker Despot Axe Variant: Pre 2.6.0 Variant: Pre 3.6.0 Variant: Pre 3.11.0 Variant: Pre 3.16.0 Variant: Current Selected Variant: 5 Quality: 20 Sockets: R-R-R-R-R-R LevelReq: 66 Implicits: 0 {variant:1,2}{range:0.5}(200-250)% increased Physical Damage {variant:3}{range:0.5}(250-285)% increased Physical Damage {variant:4}{range:0.5}(170-200)% increased Physical Damage {variant:5}{range:0.5}(190-240)% increased Physical Damage {range:0.5}(7-12)% increased Attack Speed {variant:2,3,4,5}{range:0.5}(30-40)% increased Critical Strike Chance {variant:1}{range:0.5}+(100-150) to maximum Mana Nearby Allies have 30% increased Item Rarity Nearby Allies have Culling Strike {variant:2,3,4,5}Insufficient Mana doesn't prevent your Melee Attacks {variant:3,4,5}Nearby Allies have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier {variant:4,3}Nearby Allies have +1 Fortification {variant:5}Nearby Allies have +10 Fortification

Rarity: UNIQUE Legacy of Fury Wyrmscale Boots Armour: 410 ArmourBasePercentile: 0.5533 Evasion: 410 EvasionBasePercentile: 0.5533 League: Ritual Variant: Pre 3.17.0 Variant: Current Selected Variant: 2 Quality: 20 Sockets: G-G-G-G LevelReq: 69 Implicits: 0 {range:0.98}(200-300)% increased Armour and Evasion {variant:1}{range:0.98}-(15-10)% to all Elemental Resistances 30% increased Movement Speed {variant:1}Drops Scorched Ground while moving, lasting 4 seconds {variant:2}Nearby Enemies are Scorched {range:0.98}(30-50)% increased Effect of Scorch {range:0.98}(30-40)% chance when you Kill a Scorched Enemy to Burn Each surrounding Enemy for 4 seconds, dealing 8% of the Killed Enemy's Life as Fire Damage per second

Rarity: UNIQUE Crown of the Tyrant Magistrate Crown Armour: 192 ArmourBasePercentile: 0 Energy Shield: 40 EnergyShieldBasePercentile: 0 League: Delve Variant: Pre 3.11.0 Variant: Current Selected Variant: 2 Quality: 20 Sockets: R LevelReq: 58 Implicits: 0 Has 1 Socket {variant:1}{range:0.98}+(50-100) to maximum Life {variant:2}{range:0.98}+(50-175) to maximum Life Nearby Enemies have -10% to all Resistances You and Nearby Allies have 64 to 96 added Fire Damage per Red Socket You and Nearby Allies have 56 to 88 added Cold Damage per Green Socket You and Nearby Allies have 16 to 144 added Lightning Damage per Blue Socket You and Nearby Allies have 47 to 61 added Chaos Damage per White Socket

Rarity: UNIQUE The Squire Elegant Round Shield Armour: 358 ArmourBasePercentile: 0.507 Evasion: 358 EvasionBasePercentile: 0.507 Item Level: 80 Quality: 20 Sockets: W-W-W LevelReq: 70 Implicits: 1 120% increased Block Recovery Has 3 Sockets All Sockets are White +6% to Quality of Socketed Support Gems Socketed Support Gems can also Support Skills from your Main Hand 105% increased Armour and Evasion +4% Chance to Block

Rarity: UNIQUE Umbilicus Immortalis Leather Belt Item Level: 83 LevelReq: 30 Implicits: 3 6% increased Strength 4% increased Dexterity 8% increased maximum Energy Shield 8% increased maximum Life Regenerate 2% of Life per second Flasks do not apply to you Flasks you Use apply to your Raised Zombies and Spectres Corrupted

Rarity: UNIQUE Bottled Faith Sulphur Flask Item Level: 85 Quality: 20 LevelReq: 27 Implicits: 3 {crafted}62% increased effect {crafted}Gains no Charges during Effect Creates Consecrated Ground on Use Lasts 7,30 Seconds Consumes 40 of 60 Charges on use Currently has 60 Charges 29% reduced Duration Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 9% increased Damage taken to Enemies 142% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect

Rarity: UNIQUE Dying Sun Ruby Flask Item Level: 86 Quality: 20 LevelReq: 68 Implicits: 2 {crafted}70% increased effect {crafted}Gains no Charges during Effect Lasts 5,30 Seconds Consumes 47 of 50 Charges on use Currently has 50 Charges 135% increased Charges per use 45% less Duration 20% increased Area of Effect during Effect Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Effect

Rarity: UNIQUE Oriath's End Bismuth Flask Item Level: 87 Quality: 20 LevelReq: 56 Implicits: 2 {crafted}66% increased effect {crafted}Gains no Charges during Effect Lasts 9,40 Seconds Consumes 15 of 40 Charges on use Currently has 40 Charges 21% increased Charge Recovery Enemies you Kill during Effect have a 29% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Damage of a Random Element

Rarity: UNIQUE Bottled Faith Sulphur Flask Item Level: 85 Quality: 20 LevelReq: 27 Implicits: 3 {crafted}68% increased effect {crafted}Gains no Charges during Effect Creates Consecrated Ground on Use Lasts 7,30 Seconds Consumes 40 of 60 Charges on use Currently has 0 Charges 29% reduced Duration Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 9% increased Damage taken to Enemies 142% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect

Rarity: MAGIC Brewer's Topaz Flask of the Horsefly Item Level: 83 Quality: 20 LevelReq: 65 Implicits: 2 {crafted}69% increased effect {crafted}Gains no Charges during Effect Lasts 9,60 Seconds Consumes 15 of 50 Charges on use Currently has 50 Charges 24% reduced Charges per use 17% increased Cast Speed during Effect

Rarity: RARE Pandemonium Brow Hubris Circlet Energy Shield: 287 EnergyShieldBasePercentile: 0.5184 Searing Exarch Item Eater of Worlds Item Item Level: 85 Quality: 28 Sockets: B-B-G-B LevelReq: 69 Implicits: 2 12% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 16% increased Conductivity Curse Effect {fractured}+2 to Level of all Minion Skill Gems +58 to maximum Energy Shield 71% increased Energy Shield +47% to Lightning Resistance 10% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills {crafted}+25 to Strength and Dexterity

Rarity: RARE Hypnotic Spark Small Cluster Jewel Item Level: 85 LevelReq: 67 Implicits: 2 {crafted}Adds 3 Passive Skills {crafted}Added Small Passive Skills grant: 6% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +10% to Cold Resistance Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +8 to Intelligence Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +18 to Maximum Energy Shield Added Small Passive Skills have 35% increased Effect

Rarity: RARE Beast Spiral Unset Ring Crusader Item Item Level: 84 Sockets: B LevelReq: 5 Implicits: 1 Has 1 Socket Quality (Defence Modifiers): +20% +3 to Level of Socketed Gems +31 to Strength and Dexterity +54 to maximum Energy Shield 18% increased maximum Energy Shield +44% to Fire Resistance {crafted}+1 to Minimum Endurance Charges

Rarity: RARE Whispering Gaze Ghastly Eye Jewel Item Level: 78 LevelReq: 46 Implicits: 0 Abyss +28 to maximum Energy Shield Minions deal 17% increased Damage if you've used a Minion Skill Recently Minions have 6% increased Attack Speed Minions have 4% increased Cast Speed Minions deal 2 to 44 additional Lightning Damage

Rarity: UNIQUE The Wise Oak Bismuth Flask Item Level: 85 Quality: 20 LevelReq: 8 Implicits: 2 {crafted}68% increased effect {crafted}Gains no Charges during Effect Lasts 10,20 Seconds Consumes 15 of 40 Charges on use Currently has 0 Charges During Effect, 6% reduced Damage taken of each Element for which your Uncapped Elemental Resistance is lowest During Effect, Damage Penetrates 8% Resistance of each Element for which your Uncapped Elemental Resistance is highest

Rarity: MAGIC Guardian's Corvine Charm of the Occultist Item Level: 80 Implicits: 0 Regenerate 2.5% of Energy Shield per second While there are at least five nearby Allies, you and nearby Allies have Onslaught

Rarity: UNIQUE Garb of the Ephemeral Savant's Robe Energy Shield: 429 EnergyShieldBasePercentile: 1 League: Synthesis Quality: 20 Sockets: B-B-B-B-B-B LevelReq: 56 Implicits: 0 {fractured}{range:0.5}(180-230)% increased Energy Shield +600 Strength and Intelligence Requirement Gain a Divine Charge on Hit +10 to maximum Divine Charges You gain Divinity for 10 seconds on reaching maximum Divine Charges Lose all Divine Charges when you gain Divinity Nearby Allies' Action Speed cannot be modified to below base value Nearby Enemies cannot deal Critical Strikes

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
Spirit of Fortune custom Mods: /Spectres have 328% more life /Spectres have 50% increased cast speed /Spectres deal 493-1450 added lightning damage /Spectres have 24% less cast speed /Nearby allies deal 28% more Spell Lightning Damage /Nearby Allies' damage with hits is lucky
Kingmaker (AG): Culling Strike Nearby Allies have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier Nearby Allies have +10 Fortification
AG Boots: Nearby enemies are scorched 50% increased effect of Scorch
Crown of the Tyrant (AG): Nearby Enemies have -10% to all Resistances You and Nearby Allies have 64 to 96 added Lightning Damage
Bone Offering: Regenerate 2.5% of Life per second if you've blocked recently Minions regenerate 5% of life per second
